titles.title: To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain color television receiver entries to correct an error that was made in connection with the original liquidation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/1/2000--Introduced. Provides for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain color television receiver entries in accordance with the final results of the administrative reviews, covering specified periods, undertaken by the International Trade Administration of the Department of Commerce for such entries.
